crangraph.utils.crangraph_utils module¶

crangraph.utils.crangraph_utils.build_release_path(pkg_name, pkg_version)[source]¶

Given a package name and version, return full URLs to package metadata on CRAN mirror.

Args:

pkg_name (str): Name of an R package

pkg_version (str): Version number for an R package

crangraph.utils.crangraph_utils.exists_on_github(pkg_name)[source]¶

This function checks whether or not a given package has a repo on the CRAN mirror.

Args:
pkg_name (str): Name of an R package
crangraph.utils.crangraph_utils.filter_version_reqs(pkg_dep_string)[source]¶

Given R package listing in a DESCRIPTION file, potentially strip off version requirements.

e.g. Turns “data.table (>= 1.0.1), ggplot2” to “data.table, ggplot2”

Args:
pkg_dep_string (str): A string with package dependencies from the Imports field of an R DESCRIPTION file.
crangraph.utils.crangraph_utils.find_release_commit(pkg_name, pkg_version)[source]¶

Given a package name and version, find the corresponding commit on the package’s CRAN mirror repo on GitHub.

Args:

pkg_name (str): Name of an R package

pkg_version (str): Version number for an R package

crangraph.utils.crangraph_utils.get_metadata(pkg_name)[source]¶

Given the name of a package on CRAN, hit CRAN and get the DESCRIPTION file. Return the DESCRIPTION contents as a string.

Args:
pkg_name (str): Name of R package
crangraph.utils.crangraph_utils.get_old_releases(pkg_name)[source]¶

Given the name of a package on CRAN, hit that package’s CRAN archive page to get a list of all releases.

Returns a dictionary where keys are version numbers and values are release date-times.

Args:
pkg_name (str): Name of an R package
crangraph.utils.crangraph_utils.get_package_list()[source]¶

Grab a list of all available packages currently on CRAN.

Returns:
dict: a dictionary keyed by package name.
crangraph.utils.crangraph_utils.scrape_deps_from_description(description_text)[source]¶

Given a raw DESCRIPTION file from an R package, return a dictionary with package dependencies.

Args:
description_text (str): Raw text of an R package’s DESCRIPTION file

Returns:
